   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   d   ,   c   )   {   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       f   (   a   )   {   b   .   p   u   s   h   (   a   )   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       e   (   a   )   {   i   f   (   a   )   {   v   a   r       c   =   d   .   h   e   a   d   |   |   d   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   "   h   e   a   d   "   )   [   0   ]   |   |   d   .   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   ,   b   =   d   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   "   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   )   ;   b   .   a   s   y   n   c   =   "   a   s   y   n   c   "   ;   b   .   s   r   c   =   a   ;   c   .   i   n   s   e   r   t   B   e   f   o   r   e   (   b   ,   c   .   f   i   r   s   t   C   h   i   l   d   )   }   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       g   (   )   {   u   e   .   u   e   l   s   =   e   ;   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       a   =   0   ;   a   b   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   ;   a   +   +   )   e   (   b   [   a   ]   )   ;   u   e   .   d   e   f   f   e   r   e   d   =   1   }   v   a   r       b   =   [   ]   ;   c   .   u   e   &amp;&amp;(   u   e   .   u   e   l   s   =   f   ,   c   .   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   &amp;&amp;c   .   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   g   )   )   }   )   (   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   ;   
   
   
                   i   f       (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e       &amp;&amp;    w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   .   u   e   l   s   )       {

                   u   l       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   h   o   r   i   z   o   n   t   a   l       a   -   s   i   z   e   -   s   m   a   l   l   "   &gt;

                                   a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   T   e   x   t   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   3   m   A   O   v   b   1   J   A   R   K   G   N   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   U   R   I   =   %   2   F   d   p   %   2   F   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   "   &gt;   S   h   a   r   e   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;                            a       i   d   =   "   s   w   f   I   m   a   g   e   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       e   m   a   i   l   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   h   a   r   e       v   i   a       e   -   m   a   i   l   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   p   d   p   /   t   a   f   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   l   _   v   i   e   w   _   d   p   _   3   m   A   O   v   b   1   J   A   R   K   G   N   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   a   r   e   n   t   A   S   I   N   =   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   N   a   m   e   =   i   t   e   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   T   y   p   e   =   a   s   i   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   y   n   a   m   i   c   S   W   F   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   y   p   e   =   S   H   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   I   D   =   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   e   m   a   i   l   T   e   m   p   l   a   t   e   =   %   2   F   g   p   %   2   F   p   d   p   %   2   F   c   o   m   m   o   n   %   2   F   e   m   a   i   l   %   2   F   s   h   a   r   e   -   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   D   P   X   =   1   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   a   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   &amp;a   m   p   ;   r   e   l   a   t   e   d   A   c   c   o   u   n   t   s   =   a   m   a   z   o   n   d   e   a   l   s   %   2   C   a   m   a   z   o   n   m   p   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   o   k   e   n   =   7   A   1   A   4   A   E   8   F   6   C   E   0   B   D   2   7   7   D   8   2   9   5   E   5   8   7   0   2   D   2   8   3   F   3   2   9   C   0   F   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   h   a   r   e   -   t   w   i   t   t   e   r   "       a   r   i   a   -   l   a   b   e   l   =   "   T   w   i   t   t   e   r   "   &gt;                                                    a       d   a   t   a   -   h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   5   7   0   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   b   l   a   n   k   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   P   i   n       i   t       o   n       P   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   g   p   /   r   e   d   i   r   e   c   t   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   c   m   _   s   w   _   c   l   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   3   m   A   O   v   b   1   J   A   R   K   G   N   ?   _   e   n   c   o   d   i   n   g   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   o   c   a   t   i   o   n   =   h   t   t   p   %   3   A   %   2   F   %   2   F   p   i   n   t   e   r   e   s   t   .   c   o   m   %   2   F   p   i   n   %   2   F   c   r   e   a   t   e   %   2   F   b   u   t   t   o   n   %   3   F   u   r   l   %   3   D   h   t   t   p   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   F   %   2   5   2   F   w   w   w   .   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   d   p   %   2   5   2   F   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   %   2   5   2   F   r   e   f   %   2   5   3   D   c   m   _   s   w   _   r   _   p   i   _   d   p   _   3   m   A   O   v   b   1   J   A   R   K   G   N   %   2   6   t   i   t   l   e   %   3   D   A   s   %   2   5   2   0   C   o   n   s   c   i   o   u   s   n   e   s   s   %   2   5   2   0   I   s   %   2   5   2   0   H   a   r   n   e   s   s   e   d   %   2   5   2   0   t   o   %   2   5   2   0   F   l   e   s   h   %   2   5   3   A   %   2   5   2   0   J   o   u   r   n   a   l   s   %   2   5   2   0   a   n   d   %   2   5   2   0   N   o   t   e   b   o   o   k   s   %   2   5   2   C   %   2   5   2   0   1   9   6   4   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   %   2   5   2   F   i   m   a   g   e   s   %   2   5   2   F   I   %   2   5   2   F   4   1   t   3   U   L   p   U   s   m   L   .   j   p   g   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   o   k   e   n   =   9   F   5   8   B   3   6   6   2   5   8   E   1   A   8   B   5   2   5   9   E   9   B   E   F   3   4   8   2   E   0   2   3   4   1   F   4   2   D   3   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -    s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   a   -   s   t   a   t   e   "       d   a   t   a   -   a   -   s   t   a   t   e   =   "   {   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   k   e   y   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   :   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   p   o   p   o   v   e   r   S   t   a   t   e   &amp;q   u   o   t   ;   }   "   &gt;   {   "   s   h   o   w   W   i   s   h   L   i   s   t   D   r   o   p   D   o   w   n   "   :   t   r   u   e   ,   "   w   i   s   h   l   i   s   t   P   o   p   o   v   e   r   W   i   d   t   h   "   :   2   3   2   ,   "   f   o   r   m   I   d   "   :   "   a   d   d   T   o   C   a   r   t   "   ,   "   s   h   o   w   P   o   p   o   v   e   r   "   :   f   a   l   s   e   ,   "   i   s   A   d   d   T   o   W   i   s   h   L   i   s   t   D   r   o   p   D   o   w   n   A   u   i   E   n   a   b   l   e   d   "   :   t   r   u   e   ,   "   b   a   b   y   R   e   g   i   s   t   r   y   I   d   "   :   "   a   d   d   -   t   o   -   r   e   g   i   s   t   r   y   -   b   a   b   y   -   b   u   t   t   o   n   "   ,   "   s   h   o   w   B   a   b   y   R   e   g   D   r   o   p   d   o   w   n   "   :   f   a   l   s   e   }   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

  a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   I   /   3   1   W   9   0   s   N   t   a   x   L   .   j   p   g   "   ,   "   d   i   m   e   n   s   i   o   n   s   "   :   [   3   7   5   ,   5   0   0   ]   ,   "   t   h   u   m   b   U   r   l   "   :   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   e   c   x   .   i   m   a   g   e   s   -   a   m   a   z   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   i   m   a   g   e   s   /   I   /   3   1   W   9   0   s   N   t   a   x   L   .   _   A   C   _   S   X   7   5   _   C   R   ,   0   ,   0   ,   7   5   ,   7   5   _   .   j   p   g   "   }   ]   ,   
                                   '   c   e   n   t   e   r   C   o   l   M   a   r   g   i   n   '       :       4   0   ,   
                                   '   d   i   s   a   b   l   e   R   e   s   i   z   e   '       :       f   a   l   s   e   
                   }   ;   
                   r   e   t   u   r   n       d   a   t   a   ;   
   }   )   ;   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

   	   	   	   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   u   t   h   o   r       n   o   t   F   a   d   e   d   "       d   a   t   a   -   w   i   d   t   h   =   "   "   &gt;

  i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   b   i   n   d   i   n   g   C   o   u   n   t   =   2   &amp;a   m   p   ;   m   e   t   a   b   i   n   d   i   n   g   I   n   d   e   x   =   3   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   o   r   =   U   S   &amp;a   m   p   ;   a   s   i   n   =   1   2   5   0   0   2   4   1   2   9   &amp;a   m   p   ;   p   r   o   d   u   c   t   T   y   p   e   D   e   f   i   n   i   t   i   o   n   =   A   B   I   S   _   B   O   O   K   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   a   s   P   a   r   e   n   t   A   s   i   n   =   B   0   0   5   X   N   V   V   U   M   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   r   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   w   e   b   s   i   t   e   D   i   s   p   l   a   y   G   r   o   u   p   =   b   o   o   k   _   d   i   s   p   l   a   y   _   o   n   _   w   e   b   s   i   t   e   &amp;a   m   p   ;   q   i   d   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   a   g   A   c   t   i   o   n   C   o   d   e   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   l   a   n   d   i   n   g   A   s   i   n   =   0   3   7   4   1   0   0   7   6   4   &amp;a   m   p   ;   n   o   d   e   I   D   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   m   e   t   a   b   i   n   d   i   n   g   =   p   a   p   e   r   b   a   c   k   _   m   e   t   a   _   b   i   n   d   i   n   g   &amp;a   m   p   ;   i   s   P   r   i   m   e   =   0   &amp;a   m   p   ;   s   t   o   r   e   I   D   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   c   u   s   t   o   m   e   r   I   D   =   &amp;a   m   p   ;   v   i   e   w   I   D   =   g   l   a   n   c   e   "   ,   "   u   r   l   _   2   "   :   "   /   g   p   /   m   e   d   i   a   -   m   a   t   r   i   x   /   f   e   t   c   h   -   D   P   X   -   e   x   p   a   n   s   i   o   n   -   d   a   t   a   .   h   t   m   l   /   r   e   f   =   t   m   m   _   h   r   d   _   m   e   t   a   b   i   n   d   i   n   g   _   e   x   p   a   n   s   i   o   n   _   s   r   ?                            v   a   r       h       =       g   e   t   D   o   c   H   e   i   g   h   t   (   i   f   r   a   m   e   D   o   c   )   ;   
                           i   f       (   h       !   =       0   )       {   
                                   i   f   r   a   m   e   R   e   f   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   h   e   i   g   h   t       =       h       +       '   p   x   '   ;   
                           }       e   l   s   e       {       
                                   i   f       (   n   T   r   i   e   s           M   A   X   _   T   R   I   E   S   )       {   
                                           n   T   r   i   e   s   +   +   ;   
                                           s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {   
                                                   s   e   t   I   f   r   a   m   e   H   e   i   g   h   t   (   i   f   r   m   I   d   )   ;   
                                           }   ,       5   0   )   ;       
                                   }   
                           }   
                   }   
           }   
           o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   l   o   a   d       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {   
                   v   a   r       i   f   r   a   m   e       =       d   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   B   y   I   d   (   o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   )   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   d   i   s   p   l   a   y       =       '   '   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   s   t   y   l   e   .   h   e   i   g   h   t       =       "   1   p   x   "   ;   
                   s   e   t   T   i   m   e   o   u   t   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (   )       {   
                           i   f   (   o   b   j   .   n   e   e   d   W   i   d   t   h   A   d   j   u   s   t   )       {   
                                   s   e   t   I   f   r   a   m   e   W   i   d   t   h   (   o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   )   ;   
                           }   
                           s   e   t   I   f   r   a   m   e   H   e   i   g   h   t   (   o   b   j   .   i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   )   ;   
                           v   a   r       o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k       =       o   b   j   .   o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k   ;   
                           i   f   (   t   y   p   e   o   f       o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k       =   =   =       "   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   "   )       {   
                                   o   n   l   o   a   d   C   a   l   l   b   a   c   k   (   )   ;   
                           }   
                   }   ,       5   0   )   ;       
   
           }   
           o   b   j   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   I   f   r   a   m   e       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       (       i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   ,       o   n   l   o   a   d   F   n       )       {   
                   v   a   r       i   f   r   a   m   e       =       d   .   c   r   e   a   t   e   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   (   '   i   f   r   a   m   e   '   )   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   i   d       =       i   f   r   a   m   e   I   d   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   c   l   a   s   s   N   a   m   e       =       "   a   p   _   n   e   v   e   r   _   h   i   d   e   "   ;   
                   i   f   r   a   m   e   .   w   i   d   t   h       =       "   1   0   0   %   "   ;

  i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;s   h   o   w   V   i   e   w   p   o   i   n   t   s   =   0   &amp;s   o   r   t   B   y   =   b   y   S   u   b   m   i   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   e   D   e   s   c   e   n   d   i   n   g   #   R   3   L   5   I   K   8   Z   X   E   I   9   T   K   "   &gt;   i       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   i   c   o   n       a   -   i   c   o   n   -   s   t   a   r       a   -   s   t   a   r   -   5   "   &gt;   /   i   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   e   t   t   e   r   -   s   p   a   c   e   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   a       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   -   l   i   n   k   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   -   t   e   x   t   -   n   o   r   m   a   l       a   -   c   o   l   o   r   -   b   a   s   e   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   R   e   a   d       t   h   e       f   u   l   l       r   e   v   i   e   w       b   y       S   a   n   d   r   a       Y   .
